messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: One of our old frigates was on autopilot towards your station and looks as if it will arrive soon. When it does so we would like the crew to clean up the frigate and you shall be rewarded.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The frigate has arrived, please make any cleaning and repairs necessary. You are free to keep any equipment found inside however.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Perna Landys. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I FOUND A NUCLEAR BOMB, WOOOOO, TIME TO PARTY WITH THE DANGER OF OUR LIVES!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I actually got the nuke codes. Centcomm is stupid

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
